
============
nested lists
============

Bullet list inside numbered list:
---------------------------------

#. Number 1
#. Number 2

   * Bullet 1
   * Bullet 2

#. Number 3


Number list inside bullet list:
-------------------------------

* Bullet 1
* Bullet 2
  
  #. Number 1
  #. Number 2

* Bullet 3

Nested bulleted lists
---------------------

* Bullet 1
* Bullet 2
  
  * sub-bullet1
  * sub-bullet 2

* Bullet 3

Nested number lists
---------------------

#. Number 1
#. Number 2
  
   #. sub-number 1
   #. sub-number 2

#. Number 3

This is the end
---------------
